profile.name: üîó MCP Integration Hub
profile.description: MCP server management, monitoring, and Warp integration control center
startup_commands: echo 'üîó === MCP INTEGRATION HUB CONTROL CENTER === üîó'
echo 'üì° Model Context Protocol Management Active'
node monitoring/health-check.cjs 2>/dev/null || echo 'Initializing MCP health monitoring...'
echo '  - claude "Check MCP server health and status"'
echo '  - claude "Restart MCP servers if needed"'
echo 'üîß MCP Hub ready for server management!'

shortcuts.cmd+shift+s: claude "Show detailed MCP server status and capabilities"
shortcuts.cmd+shift+r: claude "Restart all MCP servers and test connectivity"
shortcuts.cmd+shift+t: claude "Test MCP integration with Warp.dev and validate all endpoints"
